localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

What do you get when you mix the turn based battle system of school RPG's and the randomness of board games such as Risk.... You get Monster Kombat. In Monster Kombat you choose between 6 unique characters with their own unique skills and face off against another character.

Monster Kombat also has same device multiplayer for 2 people on the same device.

Package size: 39 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1-2 Players

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

Copyright(C) 2015 Azeem A Khan

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
